entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add support for named synchronization objects that are restricted to the creating user (where applicable) #91147
    9.0.0
  • [8.0] [wasm] WorkloadNotRequiredForInvariantGlobalization timeout waiting for web server url #91143
  • JIT: antigen test case fails when unwind fragment size is set very low #91139
    Future
  • Type and content inconsistency between TcpClient.Client.LocalEndPoint/RemoteEndPoint and TcpConnectionInformation.LocalEndPoint/RemoteEndPoint #91137
  • System.Text.Json DateTime and DateTimeOffset only write six (6) significant digits for the seconds fraction #91134
  • Android NTLM: Empty Credentials now throws PlatformNotSupportedException #91131
  • Missing Callstack Information For Outer Exception Thrown Within Catch Block #91125
  • [API Proposal]: Add `string.ReplaceAt` #91124
  • LoggerMessage source generator does not work with logger from primary constructor. #91121
    9.0.0
  • API Discussion: HttpContent #91111
  • SSL_CERT_DIR should support multiple paths #91110
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed '!"Jump into middle of try region"' in 'TestClass:Method22(byref,TestClass+S2,byref,byref,byref):TestClass+S2:this' during 'Find loops' #91108
    8.0.0
  • DataContractJsonSerializer throws exception - Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'key') #91104
  • DateTime.DaysInMonth minor performance tweaks #91103
  • Confused about unobserved exception #91100
  • Test failure Loader/classloader/generics/Instantiation/Positive/MultipleInterface04/MultipleInterface04.sh #91099

Closed

  • ComWrappers.GetOrCreateObjectForComInstance becomes expensive during the Get cached RCW scenario when called from multiple threads #90964
    9.0.0
  • ComInterfaceGenerator should provide an info message when arrays don't have any [In] or [Out] attributes #90884
    8.0.0
  • Build fails with "eng/common/tools.sh: line 474: 537 Segmentation fault" #76759
  • Exception on `MakeGenericMethod` called on a static interface method from `GetInterfaceMap`'s `TargetMethods` #90351
    9.0.0
  • Heavy stuttering/freezes due to GC pauses caused by System.IndexOutOfRangeException in TlsOverPerCoreLockedStacksArrayPool during gen2 GC #91136
  • Explicit static interface implementation compiles but program crashes with "Fatal error" with .NET 7 #86993
    7.0.x
  • ProfilingAPI: `ICorProfilerInfo14::GetNonGCHeapBounds` deadlock on .NET 8.0-preview7 #90830
    8.0.0
  • Are synchronous Sockets thread-safe? #26843
    8.0.0
  • Socket.Send not thread-safe on Linux #44422
    8.0.0
  • Improvements to NativeAOT compilation via meta-data #91113
  • Feature Request: Fully Support AoT Compilation & CIL Stripping for Android #44855
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Runtime_82535 crashes on osx x64 #89585
    8.0.0
  • native aot regression in .net 8.0 #91065
  • IAsyncEnumerator question - clear Current when MoveNextAsync is called #90855

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Use reader/writer lock instead of mutex for `ComWrappers` RCW cache #91149
    Servicing-consider, area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Rename EnC related defines #91146
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix diagnostic creation to ensure including the URI #91145
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2252827 #91144
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • Add docs for new protected APIs added in Reflection.Emit #91142
    area-System.Reflection
  • Allow for PublishAot and PublishSingleFile at the same time #91141
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Switch to python generated source #91140
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Make handling of DefaultCredentials in NegotiateAuthentication/SocketsHttpHandler more consistent #91138
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Enable trimming for crossgen2 publishing and fix symbol bug #91135
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [DependencyInjection] introduce feature switch to disable S.R.E #91133
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Remove FEATURE_BASICFREEZE #91132
    area-GC-coreclr
  • GC finalization cleanup #91129
    area-GC-coreclr
  • CI test #91126
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Disable objc_msgSend stubs in clang for compatibility with Xcode 13 #91118
    Servicing-consider, os-mac-os-x, area-Infrastructure, os-ios, os-tvos, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Disable objc_msgSend stubs in clang for compatibility with Xcode 13 #91117
    Servicing-consider, os-mac-os-x, area-Infrastructure, os-ios, os-tvos, 7.0.x
  • Activate Quic Alpn Narrowing Test #91116
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix invalid user info processing #91106
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasm] testing tfm net9.0 changes #91105
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Enable SuperPMI collection of a libraries tests run #91101
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0

Merged

  • Use reader/writer lock instead of mutex for `ComWrappers` RCW cache #91120
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Recommend [In] and [Out] attributes on array parameters #91094
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Fix diagnostic creation to ensure including the URI #91123
    area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] JIT: Fix physical promotion creating overlapping local uses #91088
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [browser] fix MSBuild typo #91127
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix a deadlock in NonGC + Profiler API #91130
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Emit interceptor info correctly when invocation expr is on separate line #91107
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Use RuntimeIdentifierGraphPath if available in runtime copy of Microsoft.NET.CrossGen.targets #91090
    Servicing-approved, area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] JIT: Skip Create(ToScalar(Dot(...))) transformation on mismatched types #91089
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix calling existing ctor with MethodInvoker; share tests with invokers #90968
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • Add tests for `GetInterfaceMap` on static interface methods #90518
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Use xunit.assert fork in dotnet/runtime #91091
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • New Microsoft.BCL.Numerics package #91074
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Split crossgen2 into two source build intermediates #91128
    needs-area-label
  • Regression test for issue #86993 #90906
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix a deadlock in NonGC + Profiler API #90847
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [browser] fix MSBuild typo #91119
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Switch HostVersionCompatibility test to use 6.0 as old runtime #91098
    area-Host
  • Disable two H2 MultipleConnections tests #91115
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the compile error after #88034. #91109
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [browser] download sequence optimization #90388
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix tmpReg in emitInsTernary #90770
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Use RuntimeIdentifierGraphPath if available in pretest.proj #91102
    needs-area-label
  • Add boolean field to indicate whether or not the Windows thread pool is being used #90551
    area-System.Threading

Updated

  • [NOT READY] GC: Rearrange finalization queue to put freelist in middle #91029
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Ability to request stackwalk per EventPipe session #84077
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add New Test to Monitor Number of Jitted Methods #90681
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Added IAsyncDisposable to TextReader #89477
    area-System.IO, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • Reserve FOH segments in ExecutionAllocator and properly report them to debugger #90047
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Include dotnet/hostfxr/hostpolicy symbols in Microsoft.NETCore.App.Host/Runtime packages #91031
    area-Host
  • Move event pipe utf8/utf16 string conversion functions to shared event pipe code #90774
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [Corrected] - Enable Libraries R2R Testing in CI #89405
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • [Mono][WIP] Enable IL trim for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/8.0] Fix stack_limit handling #91095
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Address feedback from config binding gen PR to improve enum parsing #89952
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • JIT: Optimize liveness fixpoint computation #89328
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix UseManagedNtlm linker substitutions #90957
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • [PERF] Add hybrid globalization testing runs #89825
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Check for generic structs in "needs marshalling" check #90836
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Expose an internal ISimdVector interface and being using it to deduplicate some SIMD code #90764
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Upgrade our TFM to net9.0 #90880
    area-Infrastructure
  • Wraping both declaration and definition in #ifndef DISABLE_LOGGING. #91042
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Format/Parse binary from/to BigInteger #85392
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Improve CopySign performance for integer types #90970
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix nullability annotations of MemberDescriptor.AttributeArray #91022
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Mono - CordbProcess::GetThread implementation #90733
    area-Debugger-mono, community-contribution
  • Delete simple quirks left from the `ASG` removal #86726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete `GT_CNS_LNG` #85951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT SuperPMI collections #91037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: add ability to pad profile counters and adjust scalable count th… #91081
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expose a `Lock` type in preview mode #87672
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Improve ArraySegment debugging #90488
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Implement standalone GC loading in NativeAOT #91038
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-25
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Rewrite exception handling to support nested dispatch #2374
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • ManagedZLib: Porting Deflate from C ZLib #2367
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Support emulated unwinding for WASI #2387

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet watch test doesn't run tests in dotnet 8 #34949
  • Package validation fail in .NET 8 with Unnecessary suppressions found #34936
    8.0.1xx

Closed

  • dotnet nuget trust command doesn't work in 8.0.0-preview.7 #34610
  • [NETSDKE2E] [Regression]With 8.0.100-rc.1.23414.11 installed, the RID shows incorrectly on Linux Alpine3.18 Arm64 #34627
  • 8.0 SDK contains many assemblies with 6.0/7.0 assembly versions #34245
  • Add a EventPipe test for a native AOT library #34839
    .NET 8.0
  • The directory structure of `sdk-manifests` is changed on .Net8 Preview 7 #34706

PullRequests

Created

  • Add test for PublishSingleFile+PublishAot #34948
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Workload history #34946
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Enable Windows thread pool config switch via Project file #34943
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use Razor with renamed compiler DLLs #34928
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Verify.Xunit to 20.8.0 #34925
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Update our TFM support and error messaging for 17.7 #34585
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] [Blazor] Remove hot reload deltas cache #34940
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Test for aot library with eventpipe #34873
    untriaged, Area-NativeAOT
  • [Blazor] Remove hot reload deltas cache #34845
    Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • Crossplatform ResourceUpdater #34394
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Add internal _UseManagedNtlm feature switch #34903
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.4xx] Fix CanSortByDownloadCountAndThenByName test by using CurrentCulture … #34893
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2252819 #34880
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Prefer docker tool when both podman and docker are present #34909
    Area-Containers, 8.0.1xx
  • Implement automated cleanup of stage 0 #34693
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #34898
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "Convert to interpolated string" code fix doesn't remove `ToString` #69721
  • Provide a knob for overridden members to keep showing in the editor's `override` menu. #69713

Closed

  • "Make struct readonly" isn't offered in case of an empty struct #69722
  • IDE0200 on mutable read-only property is invalid #69717

PullRequests

Created

  • Report missing diagnostic for typeless expression in binary operation #69727
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix NRT annotations in ASP.net EA api #69726
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Cache regexes used for embedded language detection #69725
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Trim ToString calls when converting to interpolated strings when there are interpolated string handlers available. #69723
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add System.IO.Pipelines to Version.Details for source-build #69719
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable the test method finder to find tests in nested classes. #69716
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add notification for project configuration telemetry to match VS/O# #69714
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Add to assembly crossgen to avoid JIT increase #69711
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix typo #69724
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Bind fully-typed lambda only once for error recovery #69695
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expression conversions: check elements are convertible #69627
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Pool lexed token arrays in SyntaxParser. #69499
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add granular opt-in property for interceptors #69712
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Provide dedicated classifications for embedded C# in test code. #61197
    Area-IDE
  • Update the C# syntax generator to use a few more modern C# constructs. #69703
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Work around restore issue #69710
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Run design time builds out-of-process #69616
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement find all references to preprocessing symbols #66425
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • Improve interpolated string handler compilation error #69671
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.8
  • Rename Razor compiler assemblies #69655
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Debugging Blazor WASM in Edge Browser - missing files #50349
  • Blazor Webassembly - Debugging Breaks after OIDC Authentication #50346
  • [Blazor] Wait until the initial page loads completely before activating interactive components #50344
    8.0-rc2
  • TagHelpers (asp-controller, asp-action) don't generate link if a Variable is used to set Endpoint Route Pattern #50343
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #50342
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps, fortunes_ef, fortunes_ef #50341
  • Perf improvement: caching, fortunes, fortunes_ef #50340
  • HTTPS Error using IIS Express #50335
  • Change PropertyNameCaseInsensitive's default value to false. #50333
  • Differential response mechanism for Blazor enhanced navigation, utilizing a configurable page store. #50329

Closed

  • Request Delegate Generator generates incorrect InterceptsLocation attribute when `Map...` call is on a newline relative to route builder #50348
  • Revamping form-binding in minimal APIs and MVC #49543
    8.0-rc1
  • WebApiAot ProjectTemplate add OpenAPI (Swagger) support #50134
  • Obtaining aspnet parameter binding metadata #50300
  • Perf regression: caching, single_query #50270
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, multiple_queries #50330
  • Perf regression: plaintext #50331
  • Exception filters with ordering executing decending. #49372
  • Streaming rendering is blocked by CSS Hot Reload (possibly by browserlink) #47608
    8.0-rc2
  • Support certificate auto-rotation in Kestrel #32351
    8.0-rc1
  • [Blazor] Fix WebAssembly hot reload deltas cache #48836
    8.0-rc2
  • Issue rendering IHtmlContent in Razor component #50334
  • Close circuit when there are no remaining interactive Server components #48765
    8.0-rc2
  • Add ambiguity breaker (hook) in DefaultEndpointSelector #49547
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, json #50307
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, fortunes #50320
  • MapIdentityApi email confirmation links uses relative instead of absolute URLs #50296
    8.0-rc2
  • Clarify auth plan for Blazor web project template #48772
    8.0-rc2

PullRequests

Created

  • WIP: Add automated Blazor WebView test using Photino #50347
    area-blazor
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Delay component activation until the initial page loads completely #50345
    area-blazor
  • Try Adding Suport for XForwardedPort #50338
    community-contribution, area-networking

Merged

  • Update area-owners.md #50339
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Make it clear in the bot comment that repros must be GitHub repos and not ZIPs #50149
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Update Microsoft.Identity.Model to 7.0.0-preview3 #50218
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 8.0-rc2
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `f42da0e` to `460ae98` #50336
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Close the circuit when all Blazor Server components are disposed #50170
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc2
  • Use absolute URLs for confirmation emails #50297
    area-identity, 8.0-rc2
  • Update area-owners.md #50327
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Remove Visual Studio Extension development workload requirement from `.vsconfig` #50202
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Enable build acceleration #50205
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50281
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, area-networking
  • Add feature to expose IIS hosting details #50128
    area-networking
  • HttpLogging redaction and enrichment #50163
    area-middleware, 8.0-rc2
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2252614 #49575
    area-mvc
  • added builder config - appsettings to BlazorWeb template #50208
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Add ProblemDetials.Extensions to ControllerBase.Problem and ControllerBase.ValidationProblem #50204
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Add exclusion for `.vsconfig` file to CI #50203
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Styling Update for Header and Footer Elements #50130
    community-contribution, feature-templates, area-ui-rendering
  • Update IdWeb 2.13.2 #50072
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Ignore properties without public setters during form mapping #50318
    area-blazor
  • Consume IHostEnvironment.ContentRootFileProvider from CertificatePathWatcher #50246
    area-networking
  • [Draft] Watch certificates using polling and checksums #50172
    area-networking
  • Call AddMetrics inside AddRouting #50168
    blocked, area-networking, area-routing
  • [DRAFT] Consider symlinks when watching certificate file paths #50074
    area-networking
  • Simplify redis cache setup #49722
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Draft: Support null values in Results/TypedResults #49588
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Modernize Redis distributed cache #45735
    area-networking
  • Remove default logging scope from ASP.NET Core #44873
    breaking-change, pending-ci-rerun, needs-breaking-change-announcement, area-networking
  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-rc.1.23407.2 #49911
    area-infrastructure
  • Simplify and optimize async parameters in RequestDelegateFactory #42588
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Create a manual test for #16986 #17014
  • Nested CollectionView blocks selection in parent #17013
  • Image in CollectionView renders white or black occasionally on Android #17011
  • Unable to Update iOS SwipeGesture Direction at Runtime #17010
  • Unnecessary Compiler rebuilds #17005
  • The initial child element of the Grid Layout occupies the entire height of the layout. #17000
    Backlog
  • The default sample program cannot enter debugging, does not report errors, and is stuck. #16998
  • Grid - HeightRequest and WidthRequest is not setting properly in SizeChanged event #16995

Closed

  • Incorrect Arrangement of Children in Grid Layout #16999
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] Maui MenuFlyOut Crashes #16663
    .NET 8 GA
  • Viquloc #16920
  • Updating shell Tab title doesn't work via Hot Reload / code behind #15659
    .NET 8 GA
  • Entry Control does not accepting numeric inputs when Android language set to Arabic #16429
    Under Consideration
  • [regression/8.0-preview5] Entry not working when keyboard is numeric and os language is not english #15884
    .NET 8 GA
  • DisplayPromptAsync : Keyboard.Numeric broken in release mode #11865
    Under Consideration
  • [cr_AutofillHintsService] java.lang.NullPointerException: Attempt to get length of null array #16994
  • [Android] BoxView Opacity not working #12211
    Backlog
  • Opacity set in xaml becomes the maximum value during animation #11499
    Backlog
  • [Android] Animation on Opacity Issue #16729
    Backlog
  • IsVisible Property not update in ListView #10303
    Backlog
  • [regression/7.0] MAUI Buttons IsVisible=true don't display them after upd. Image element many times on Android #16718
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • IsVisible binding not showing items again if Shadow is set #15357
  • MAUI project iOS simulator startup failed MT7091 #16886
  • I'm encountering issues while using databases like MySQL and MSSQL when running my project on a mobile device. #16934
  • [regression/8.0] `.xaml.cs` file nesting doesn't work on first build #16501
    .NET 8 GA
  • Dropping files into CollectionView not working on Mac Catalyst #16979
    Backlog
  • codesign exited with code 1 #16948
  • CollectionView cause Intent memory Leak #11866
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • .NET MAUI Problem with ListView/CollectionView on iOS #12071
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • PickMultipleAsync is not working on IOS .net 7 #14270
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • [Android] The measure and arrange methods are not being called in custom layout inside the Shell TabBar. #16361
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.6] Image not loading #16364
    .NET 8 GA
  • ScrollView sizing issue in Grids in iOS #16456
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Preferences.Get(string key, bool defaultValue) fails on Android #16509
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • RadioButton initialisation makes multiple groups unusable #16724
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.5.8529] [Android] ListView doesn't get rendered #15826
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/7.0.92] DataTemplate is very slow when created in code behind on Android #16805
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [regression/7.0.92] Button Content Layout goes wrong on Android #16806
    .NET 7 + Servicing

PullRequests

Created

  • [WinUI] Fix borders not showing bottom and right side #17016
  • [android] CollectionView logical children grows with Header/Footer #17012
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc1] Merge net8.0 to 8.0.1xx-rc1 #17007
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • [core] factory methods for registering services, part 2 #17004
    area/perf 🏎️, area/hosting 🧩
  • Ignore failures from newly added UITests temporarily #17003
  • Fix for Spinner not disappearing in RefreshView #16997
    area/controls 🎮, control-refreshview, i/regression

Merged

  • [net8.0] Bump net7 version #17009
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #17006
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • Fix Flyout Crash (Windows) #16800
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-flyout, i/regression, .NET 8 GA
  • [Windows] Notify Shell tab title changes #16593
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢, .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Fix Keyboard.Numeric issue #16163
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert, area/keyboard, .NET 8 GA
  • Add Windows unpackaged DeviceTests in CI #17001
    platform/windows 🪟, area/testing
  • [workload] Move default item updates to workload sdk #16990
  • Default paths for Appium projects, to simplify run steps #16763
    area/testing
  • Use a fixed WinUI window size for Appium test app #16956
    area/testing
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16993
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [android] fix DI registration for Frame, ListView, TableView #16989
  • [android] Fixed ListView visibility and opacity on Android #16941
    area/ListView

Updated

  • Fix Android text alignment in migrated projects #16986
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮
  • Add GetPosition method to DragStartingEventArgs, DragEventArgs, and DropEventArgs #16335
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • Wrap Image with a grid on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #15122
    area/controls 🎮, control-image, Under Consideration
  • Update Page API docs #16981
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [RC1] Implement Platform Args for Drag and Drop EventArgs #16962
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, area/platform
  • [macOS] Implement IsEnabled property in MenuFlyoutItems #14920
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-contextmenu, .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Changes in Border clipping part #15856
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-border, i/regression, .NET 8 GA
  • Windows CollectionView TapGesture from keyboard #16952
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Add a template for multi-head maui apps #16988
    area/templates 📄
  • Rename Accelerator to KeyboardAccelerator #16740
    area/keyboard, .NET 8 GA
  • [ios] fix memory leak in SearchBar #16383
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 GA
  • Avoid NRE if no shell items are visible #16946
    area/shell 🐢
  • Fix text toolbar item icon not removed when navigating on Android #16796
    community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Add SetupContent/UnhookContent to WinUI ListView.CellControl #16977
    area/ListView
  • Add MaxLength limit to cursor position updates #15970
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-entry, Under Consideration
  • Fix blurry FontImageSource icons in iOS Tab Bar and buttons #16864
    area/image :framed_picture:, .NET 8 GA

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Will DistinctBy be supported in Filtered Include? #31554
  • Consider adding EF.Constant to prevent parameterization in query #31552
  • AccessorExtensions.GetService method can not resolve multiple services with IEnumerable<> #31550

Closed

  • "Operation is not valid due to the current state of the object." when published the code #31553

PullRequests

Updated

  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Use aggregate_context instead of user_state in CreateAggregate #31531
  • 31355: SQLite: Add EF.Functions.Unhex #31454
    waiting-for-response
